text: Susanne Bauckholt (born 24 September 1965, in Berlin) is a German sailor.Susanne Meyer Bauckholt at Sports Reference Together with Katrin Adlkofer she won the world championship in the 470 in 1987 and 1989. They also and competed at 1988 and 1996 Olympics, finishing fifth each time. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Berlin Category:German female sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 1988 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Sailors at the 1996 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Olympic sailors of Germany Category:World champions in sailing for Germany Category:470 class world champions
title: Susanne Bauckholt
